description: This file contains the styling for the Tic Tac Toe frontend application, defining variables for colors, layout styles for various components, and responsive design rules.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main wrapper for the Tic Tac Toe application, centrally aligning its content.

classes.name: game-container
classes.description: Container for the Tic Tac Toe game that constrains width.

classes.name: status
classes.description: Displays the status of the game, including messages about the game's progress.

classes.name: board
classes.description: Defines the layout for the Tic Tac Toe game grid.

classes.name: square
classes.description: Styles for individual squares in the Tic Tac Toe game board.

classes.name: btn
classes.description: Styles for the buttons used in game controls, with hover effects.
